title: SLA Reporting - Prepare QBR Deck
description: An account manager prepares the slide deck for an upcoming Quarterly Business Review (QBR).

tasks.description: Generate reports for all key metrics for the last quarter: ticket counts, SLA performance, backup status, and patch compliance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager gathers all the necessary performance data.

tasks.description: Summarize the data into clear, easy-to-understand charts and graphs for the presentation.
Add strategic recommendations for the next quarter based on the data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The QBR deck is complete and ready to be presented to the client.
